mapper.select: SELECT CAR.carId, TRIP.StartT, TRIP.endT, CAR.modelCode, MODEL.name modelName, if(TRIP.StartT IS NULL, '미운행', if(TRIP.EndT IS NULL, '운행중', '미운행')) STATUS, (SELECT TotalDistance FROM OBD_DATA WHERE vinCode = CAR.vinCode AND TotalDistance IS NOT NULL ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1) distance, (SELECT CurLatitude FROM OBD_DATA WHERE VinCode = CAR.VinCode AND CurLatitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1) latitude, (SELECT CurLongitude FROM OBD_DATA WHERE VinCode = CAR.VinCode AND CurLongitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1) longitude FROM USER_CAR_INFO CAR LEFT JOIN TRIP_INFO TRIP ON CAR.VinCode = TRIP.VinCode LEFT JOIN CAR_CODE_MODEL MODEL ON MODEL.code = CAR.modelCode
